message.content:
A waffle iron is a kitchen appliance used for making waffles.

It usually has two hinged metal plates that press together to form the waffle pattern.

The plates are square or circular in shape and may be made of cast iron, aluminum or non-stick material.

The exterior of a waffle iron is often made of heat-resistant plastic or metal.

A waffle iron may have indicator lights or a thermostat to help control the temperature.

Waffle irons are commonly found in households and restaurants.

They are used for making crispy and delicious waffles for breakfast or desserts.
